Of the 41 million low-wage workers who would benefit: more than half are women and nearly one-third work in the manufacturing, construction, education, and health care fields.

If we #RaiseTheWage to $12 by 2020, 35 million workers would get a raise. We'd also lift nearly 4.5 million people out of poverty. Even better, raising the minimum wage to $15 by 2024 would give more than 41 million Americans a pay raise.
Do you remember the last time the federal minimum wage was raised? TEN years ago.
